message: Kapela hopes the priority end demand bill would dramatically strengthen the penalties for traffickers and people who solicit prostitution particularly for minors and completely eliminate any legal penalty for child trafficking victims.

data.description: According to UNITE Hawaii, 80% of the 200-300 child runaways a month in Hawaii are approached by a pimp or trafficker within the first 48 hours. Most of the victims who've been rescued or escaped a...
data.title: Sex-trafficking advocates will be at the state capitol for the "hotline poster" bill
